title: Port of London
creator_credit: Clifford Hornby, G. Buckland-Smith, Humphrey Swingler, Port of London Authority and Greenpark Productions
brief_description: The work of the Port of London Authority, which administers the tidal waters of the Thames. Shows the handling of cargoes on the docks and the storage, sampling, and grading of a wide variety of goods, also the piloting of vessels on the river.
creator_credit_for_label: Clifford Hornby, G. Buckland-Smith, Humphrey Swingler, Port of London Authority and Greenpark Productions
